title: Good Smokes + Good Beer = Good Times!
itunes:title: Good Smokes + Good Beer = Good Times!
description: This week we’re smoking CAMACHO and Room 101, and drinking Beer with Brew Master Bill Herlicka from White Birch Brewing. As Tommy's away on a golf expedition in Vermont, Dave mans the ship along side Producer Chuck with a special visit from Matt Booth from Camacho Cigars, and Mr Jonathon comes by for a special visit. Grab your favorite smoke and beverage, and join us on this week's Cigar Authority!
